sys_properties_category.name: Skytap - Demo Sales
sys_properties_category.title:
Application Overview

Harness the power of instant, self-service environments with Skytap Cloud. Skytapâ€™s rapid deployment of complex environments allows sales teams to deploy a new demo environment for every meeting, ensuring the demo behaves the same way each time it is run. With automated environment provisioning and a centralized service catalog of ready-to-go environments, Skytap Cloud lets your sales team focus on the customer, not on managing the demo.

Help and Documentation

For detailed information about configuring and administering this plugin, see the Skytap help site
